answerText: lambda calculus[10] With this computer scientist, Church names a thesis which states that every effective computation can be carried out by a universal one of his namesake machines, which consists of a tape and a read-write head.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 11 | 10 | Science | Computer Science | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Computation in this system takes place by variable substitution, which has two forms: alpha- and beta-reduction. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this system introduced by Alonzo Church to formalize the notion of effective computability.
